languages.text: {n}Арбитр обращается к старухе:{/n} "Все было как говорит Вольный Торговец. Я предложил полное уничтожение тассерция — отметьте это".
{n}Solomorne turns to the prefect.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's testimony is the truth. It should be noted that I was the one who proposed the complete destruction of the thassertium."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр обращается к старухе:{/n} "Все было как говорит Вольный Торговец. Я предложил полное уничтожение тассерция — отметьте это".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは総監の方へと向き直った。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの証言は事実だ。なお、タッセリウムの完全破壊を提案したのは俺であることを付け加えておく」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the prefect.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's testimony is the truth. It should be noted that I was the one who proposed the complete destruction of the thassertium."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは総監の方へと向き直った。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの証言は事実だ。なお、タッセリウムの完全破壊を提案したのは俺であることを付け加えておく」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wendet sich der Präfektin zu.{/n} "Die Aussage {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} entspricht der Wahrheit. Anzumerken ist, dass ich es war, der die vollständige Zerstörung des Thassertims vorgeschlagen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the prefect.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's testimony is the truth. It should be noted that I was the one who proposed the complete destruction of the thassertium."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne wendet sich der Präfektin zu.{/n} "Die Aussage {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} entspricht der Wahrheit. Anzumerken ist, dass ich es war, der die vollständige Zerstörung des Thassertims vorgeschlagen hat."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se tourne vers la préfète.{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} dit la vérité. Notez bien que c'est moi qui ai suggéré la destruction du thassertium. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the prefect.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's testimony is the truth. It should be noted that I was the one who proposed the complete destruction of the thassertium."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se tourne vers la préfète.{/n} « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} dit la vérité. Notez bien que c'est moi qui ai suggéré la destruction du thassertium. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se vuelve hacia la prefecta.{/n} «El testimonio {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente es cierto. Debería quedar constancia de que fui yo quien propuso la destrucción total del thassertio».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the prefect.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's testimony is the truth. It should be noted that I was the one who proposed the complete destruction of the thassertium."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se vuelve hacia la prefecta.{/n} «El testimonio {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente es cierto. Debería quedar constancia de que fui yo quien propuso la destrucción total del thassertio».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙转向了行政官。{/n}“行商浪人陈述的是事实。另外，需要指出的是，提议销毁塔瑟拉水晶的人是我。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the prefect.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's testimony is the truth. It should be noted that I was the one who proposed the complete destruction of the thassertium."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙转向了行政官。{/n}“行商浪人陈述的是事实。另外，需要指出的是，提议销毁塔瑟拉水晶的人是我。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne prefekte dönüyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in ifadesi doğrudur. Tasertiyumun tamamen yok edilmesini önerenin ben olduğumu belirtmek isterim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to the prefect.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's testimony is the truth. It should be noted that I was the one who proposed the complete destruction of the thassertium."
